result.name: Phenotypic and genotypic characterization of Sudanese goat breeds 2
result.description: The current study aimed at the identification of casein protein variants in five domestic goats breeds from Sudan (Nubian, Desert, Nilotic, Taggar and Saanen) and three wild goat species (Capra aegagrus aegagrus (Bezoar ibex), Capra nubiana (Nubian ibex), and Capra ibex (Alpine ibex)).
result.center: Animal Breeding Biology and Molecular Genetics, Humboldt University of Berlin
